name: Is It Zombie? [1 day = 1 update]
description:
You should kills zombies! At this day you have only one weapon and loot from zombies. But.. every day there is more plus one update!

All days-updates list:

* 20.11.19: Game uploaded.

* 21.11.19:

Added: Poisons: Heal (if you use it, you get 1 hp), Damage (if you use it, you get +1 damage to zombies), Damage+Heal (Yellow; If you use it, you get 1 hp + 1 damage to zombies), Inventory

Changes: added roads to map (for future)
